name: Gunflinger
description:
Play as a cowboy who can't hold onto his guns in this wave-based varmint  shooter! Only one gun can be equipped at a time, and each gun can only be fired once before it flies out of your hands, requiring a short cool-down before it can be picked up again. Hunt down the likes of snakes, bats, and bison with your (not so) trusty arsenal of six-shooters, shotguns, rifles, and beans!

Controls:

     WASD - Move

     Left Click - Use Item / Shoot

    Alt + F4 - Quit

 

Credits:

Sterling Rios: Design, Art / Animation, Audio, Programming

Zach Flores:  Programming, Design
